title: Michael C. Hall
summary: Michael Carlyle Hall (born February 1, 1971) is an American actor. He is known for playing the titular character in the Showtime series Dexter and David Fisher in the HBO drama series Six Feet Under, which collectively earned Hall a Golden Globe Award and three Screen Actors Guild Awards.[1] He has also acted in Broadway shows and narrated audiobooks. He is currently the lead vocalist in the band Princess Goes to the Butterfly Museum.
